## RestDateApi.isDate() method

Tests whether provided value is date

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isDate(value: any): value is TDate | Date;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | any | Value to be tested |

<b>Returns:</b>

value is TDate \| Date
